abstract:
The purpose of this document is to provide a single source of reference for every paper published in the journals directly related to research in Construction Management.  This volume brings together articles published during 1999.\ud
It is indexed by author and keyword and contains the titles, authors, abstracts and keywords of every article from the following journals:\ud
•	Building Research and Information (BRI)\ud
•	Construction Management and Economics (CME)\ud
•	Engineering, Construction and Architectural Management (ECAM)\ud
•	Journal of Construction Procurement (JCP)\ud
•	RICS Research Papers (RICS)\ud
The index entries give short forms of the bibliographical citations, rather than page numbers, to enable rapid reference to articles.  A cumulative volume is available from the editor.\ud
Included in this volume is an appendix listing a wide range of journals associated with construction management research, giving details of frequency, editorial addresses and web sites, as well as whether each journal is international and/or refereed.\u
publisher: Association of Researchers in Construction Management
